paragraphs: My name is Jeffrey. I live Alabama, the Southeast portion of the U.S.A. Outside of gaming I develop cloud-based web applications and love riding bicycles!

Other than SFV I enjoy playing smash bros, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, RPG's like Final Fantasy, and racing games. I've been recently introduced to Project Winter and Among Us. Highly recommend giving those a try.
You can find me playing mostly in the evening times. In the mornings I usually meditate or ride my bike to the coffee shop and read.

Finally, dogs are the best. Every time you come home, they act like they haven't seen you in a year. And the good thing about dogs... is they got different dogs for different people. Like pitbulls. The dog of dogs. If you're going to give me a dog for a pet, give me a pitbull.
